faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about booking entertainment through Bright Ears

q1.question: How do I book an artist?
q1.answer: Browse our artist directory, find someone who matches your needs, and contact them directly via LINE or phone. Discuss your event details, get a quote, and confirm the booking. It's that simple!

q2.question: Do you charge booking fees or commissions?
q2.answer: No! Bright Ears is 100% commission-free. Artists set their own prices and keep everything they earn. You pay the artist directly - we just provide the platform to connect you.

q3.question: How far in advance should I book?
q3.answer: We recommend booking at least 2-4 weeks in advance for popular dates (weekends, holidays). However, some artists may be available for last-minute bookings - just check their calendar availability.

q4.question: What types of events can I book artists for?
q4.answer: Any event! Weddings, corporate events, private parties, hotel residencies, club nights, festivals, and more. Our artists perform at all types of events across Thailand.

q5.question: What if I need to cancel or reschedule?
q5.answer: Cancellation and rescheduling policies vary by artist. Always discuss this upfront when booking. Most artists are flexible but may require advance notice for cancellations.

q6.question: Are the artists really verified?
q6.answer: Yes! All artists on our platform complete ID verification before their profiles go live. You can also see customer reviews and ratings to help you choose.

q7.question: Can I hire the same artist for multiple events?
q7.answer: Absolutely! Many customers build ongoing relationships with artists they love. You can book the same performer as often as you like for regular events or residencies.

q8.question: What payment methods do artists accept?
q8.answer: Payment arrangements are made directly with the artist. Most accept bank transfer, PromptPay, or cash. Discuss payment terms when you confirm your booking.

footer.copyright: ¬© 2026 Bright Ears Entertainment Co., Ltd. All rights reserved.

hero.title: Entertainment That Matches Your Brand
hero.subtitle: Since 2007, we've partnered with Thailand's finest hotels and venues to create seamless, bespoke entertainment experiences.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: In 2007, we started with a simple idea: hotels train their staff to perfection ‚Äî why should entertainment be any different? We began designing complete music experiences, not just booking DJs. On-site training. Curated playlists. Artists prepped on dress code, attitude, and brand values.
story.p2: What started with DJs and background music has grown into a full-service entertainment agency ‚Äî live bands, dancers, magicians, bespoke music production, custom apps, and AI-powered solutions. From rooftop bars to ballrooms, intimate lounges to large-scale events, we've become the go-to partner for venues that refuse to compromise on quality.
story.p3: The tools evolved, but the philosophy stayed the same: entertainment should feel like part of your team, not an outsourced afterthought. Today, we're a small core team partnering with hundreds of artists ‚Äî a family built on trust, creativity, and a genuine love for what we do.

whatYouGet.title: What You Get
whatYouGet.subtitle: Beyond booking ‚Äî a true entertainment partner

matching.benefit: Entertainment that feels like part of your team, not an outsourced vendor

preparation.benefit: Artists arrive knowing your brand, dress code, and expectations

management.benefit: Schedules, backups, rain cancellations, and last-minute changes ‚Äî handled

oneContact.benefit: No chasing multiple vendors or managing separate relationships

transparent.benefit: Transparent pricing with no surprises or forced exclusivity

ai.benefit: Modern tools to enhance atmosphere, efficiency, and guest experience

cta.title: Ready to Elevate Your Entertainment?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how we can create the perfect atmosphere for your venue or event.

1.question: How do I book an artist on Bright Ears?
1.answer: Browse our verified artists, view their profiles and pricing, then contact them directly via LINE or phone to discuss your event details. Once you agree on terms, the artist will send you a quotation and booking confirmation.

2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
2.answer: We support PromptPay QR code payments (most popular), bank transfers, and cash payments. All payment details will be provided in your booking quotation from the artist.

3.question: How far in advance should I book?
3.answer: We recommend booking 2-4 weeks in advance for popular dates, especially weekends and holidays. However, some artists accept last-minute bookings within 3-7 days depending on availability.

4.question: Can I cancel or reschedule my booking?
4.answer: Cancellation and rescheduling policies vary by artist and are specified in your booking contract. Typically, cancellations 7+ days before the event receive partial refunds, while last-minute cancellations may forfeit deposits.

5.question: Are all artists verified?
5.answer: Yes! All artists on Bright Ears go through a verification process including ID verification, police background checks, and portfolio reviews. You'll see verification badges (ID Verified, Police Verified, Business Verified) on artist profiles.

6.question: Does Bright Ears charge commission fees?
6.answer: No! Bright Ears is 100% commission-free. Artists set their own rates and keep 100% of their booking fees. We make money from optional premium features for artists, not from taking a cut of your bookings.

7.question: What happens if my booked artist cancels?
7.answer: In the rare event an artist must cancel, they will notify you immediately and help find a suitable replacement from our network. If no replacement is suitable, you'll receive a full refund of any deposits paid.

8.question: Can I request specific songs or music genres?
8.answer: Absolutely! Discuss your music preferences, must-play songs, and songs to avoid directly with the artist when booking. Most artists are happy to accommodate special requests and create custom setlists for your event.

9.question: What's typically included in the booking price?
9.answer: Standard bookings include the artist's performance for the agreed duration, basic sound equipment (microphone, speakers), and travel within Bangkok. Additional costs may apply for extended hours, premium equipment, travel outside Bangkok, or special requests.

10.question: How do I contact the artist after booking?
10.answer: After booking confirmation, you'll receive the artist's direct LINE ID and phone number for easy communication. You can discuss event details, song requests, equipment needs, and any special requirements directly with them.

1.question: How do I join Bright Ears as an artist?
1.answer: Click 'Apply as Entertainer' in the navigation menu and fill out our application form. We review all applications within 3-5 business days. Once approved, you'll create your profile, upload media, and go through our verification process.

2.question: Does Bright Ears charge commission fees?
2.answer: No commission fees ever! You keep 100% of your booking revenue. We offer optional paid subscription tiers (Professional ‡∏ø799/month, Featured ‡∏ø1,499/month) for enhanced visibility and premium features, but the Free tier works perfectly for getting started.

3.question: How does the verification process work?
3.answer: Verification has 3 levels: ID Verification (government ID upload), Police Verification (‡∏ø1,500 background check), and Business Verification (business registration documents). Higher verification levels increase customer trust and booking rates.

4.question: How do I receive payments from customers?
4.answer: Customers pay you directly via PromptPay, bank transfer, or cash on the day of the event. Bright Ears never holds your money - you receive 100% of payments directly. We provide invoice templates to make billing professional and easy.

5.question: How do I manage my availability calendar?
5.answer: Use your artist dashboard to set available dates, block out booked dates, and mark holidays or personal time off. Your calendar is visible to customers when they view your profile, helping prevent double-booking conflicts.

6.question: Can I set my own pricing?
6.answer: Yes! You have complete control over your rates. Set your hourly rate, minimum booking hours, and any additional fees (travel, equipment, special requests). You can adjust pricing anytime based on demand and your experience level.

7.question: What happens if I need to cancel a confirmed booking?
7.answer: Contact the customer immediately via LINE or phone. Professional cancellations 7+ days in advance usually allow rescheduling. Last-minute cancellations may result in negative reviews and affect your platform standing. Always communicate early if issues arise.

8.question: How do I communicate with potential customers?
8.answer: Customers contact you via LINE or phone (displayed on your profile). Respond within 24 hours to booking inquiries. Use our quotation templates to send professional proposals. Quick, professional communication leads to higher booking conversion rates.

9.question: What equipment do I need to provide?
9.answer: Most bookings expect basic sound equipment (microphone, portable speakers for small venues). Specify what equipment you provide in your profile. For large events, discuss equipment needs upfront - some venues provide house sound systems.

10.question: How can I get more bookings on Bright Ears?
10.answer: Key strategies: (1) Complete your profile with high-quality photos/videos, (2) Get verified (Police Verification increases bookings by 3x), (3) Respond quickly to inquiries, (4) Collect customer reviews after every gig, (5) Consider Professional or Featured tier for homepage exposure.

1.question: What areas of Thailand does Bright Ears serve?
1.answer: We primarily serve Bangkok and surrounding areas (Nonthaburi, Pathum Thani, Samut Prakan). Many artists also travel to Pattaya, Hua Hin, Phuket, and Chiang Mai for events. Check individual artist profiles for their service areas and travel fees.

2.question: What types of entertainers are available on Bright Ears?
2.answer: We feature DJs, live bands, solo singers, musicians (guitar, saxophone, piano), MCs/hosts, comedians, magicians, dancers, photographers, and keynote speakers. Browse by category to find the perfect entertainment for your event type.

3.question: Is there customer support if I have issues?
3.answer: Yes! Our support team is available via LINE and email 7 days a week. For urgent booking issues (cancellations, no-shows), we provide emergency phone support. We're here to ensure both customers and artists have great experiences.

4.question: How does pricing work on Bright Ears?
4.answer: Artists set their own rates displayed on their profiles (hourly rates, minimum hours). Final pricing depends on event duration, date (weekends/holidays cost more), location, and special requests. Always get a written quotation before confirming bookings.

5.question: What is your refund policy?
5.answer: Refund policies are set by individual artists and specified in booking contracts. Standard practice: cancellations 7+ days before events receive 50-80% refunds. Cancellations within 7 days may forfeit deposits. Artist no-shows receive full refunds plus compensation.

problem1.title: Generic Playlists Don't Match Your Brand

problem2.title: Repetitive Music Annoys Customers

step2.title: 2. Curation

step3.title: 3. Delivery

step4.title: 4. Management

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about BMAsia music curation service

q1.question: What makes BMAsia different from Spotify playlists?
q1.answer: While Spotify offers generic playlists, BMAsia provides expert-curated music specifically designed for your business type, brand identity, and customer demographics. We handle all commercial licensing, provide ongoing management, and create custom playlists that match different times of day and seasons.

q2.question: How does music licensing work?
q2.answer: All music through BMAsia is fully licensed for commercial use in Thailand. We handle all licensing compliance with performance rights organizations (PROs) so you don't have to worry about legal issues or fines. Standard streaming services like personal Spotify accounts are NOT licensed for commercial use.

q3.question: Can we request specific genres or artists?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We encourage you to share your music preferences, favorite genres, and artists to avoid. Our curators will incorporate your preferences while ensuring variety and maintaining the right atmosphere for your business.

q4.question: How often are playlists updated?
q4.answer: Starter plan: Monthly updates. Professional plan: Weekly updates. Enterprise plan: Real-time updates as needed. We also refresh playlists seasonally and add new releases that match your brand.

q5.question: What music streaming services do you support?
q5.answer: We support Spotify Business, Apple Music for Business, and YouTube Music Premium. We'll help you set up the right platform for your needs during onboarding.

q6.question: Can we have different music for different times of day?
q6.answer: Yes! This is one of our key features. We create different playlists for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and late hours to match customer energy levels and business flow.

q7.question: Is there a setup fee?
q7.answer: No setup fee! Your first month includes full onboarding, brand consultation, and initial playlist creation at no additional cost.

q8.question: Can we cancel anytime?
q8.answer: Yes, all plans are month-to-month with no long-term contracts. Cancel anytime with 30 days notice. We believe in earning your business every month.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our DJ music production services

q1.question: What's the difference between a mix and an original track?
q1.answer: A mix is a curated selection of existing tracks blended together with transitions. An original track is created from scratch with original melodies, beats, and production elements unique to you.

q2.question: How long does production take?
q2.answer: Typical turnaround is 1-4 weeks depending on complexity. Basic mixes take 1-2 weeks. Original tracks and complex remixes take 3-4 weeks. Rush delivery (3-7 days) is available for premium tier with +50% fee.

q3.question: Can I request specific genres or styles?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in all genres including EDM, house, hip-hop, Thai pop, Luk Thung, Mor Lam, and more. Tell us your style and we'll match it perfectly.

q4.question: Do I get exclusive rights to the music?
q4.answer: Yes, on Professional and Premium packages you get full commercial licensing. Premium tier includes exclusive rights, meaning we won't reuse any elements for other clients.

q5.question: What if I need rush delivery?
q5.answer: Rush delivery (3-7 days) is available for Premium tier only with a +50% rush fee. Contact us immediately to check availability as rush slots are limited.

q6.question: Can you work with Thai songs and artists?
q6.answer: Yes! We specialize in the Thai music market. We can create remixes of Thai pop hits, blend Luk Thung with modern beats, or curate sets featuring Thai and international tracks.

q7.question: What file formats do you provide?
q7.answer: Basic tier: MP3 (320kbps). Professional tier: WAV + MP3. Premium tier: WAV, MP3, FLAC, and full stems. All files are professionally mastered and ready to use.

q8.question: How many revisions are included?
q8.answer: Basic tier: 1 revision round. Professional tier: 2 revision rounds. Premium tier: Unlimited revisions until you're 100% satisfied.

q9.question: Can I use the music commercially?
q9.answer: Yes, all packages include commercial licensing. You can use your tracks for live performances, social media, radio/streaming shows, and promotional content. Premium tier includes broadcast rights.

q10.question: Do you offer DJ equipment recommendations?
q10.answer: Yes! Our education/mentorship service includes gear consulting. We can recommend controllers, mixers, speakers, and software based on your budget and goals. 1-hour consulting session: ‡∏ø3,000.
